resources.string: Your opponent plays according to this strategy : %1$s
Hint: All the returns are giving in the form x/y, where x specifies the reward for you, and y the reward for your opponent.
Hint: Your action is specified by the row. Your opponent\'s action is given by the column.
You choose: Action %1$s%nOpponent choose: Action %2$s%nYou obtain: %3$s points%nOpponent obtains: %4$s points
There is a unique Nash equilibrium in this game:%nMy Action %1$s%nOpponent Action: %2$s
There are multiple Nash equilibria in this game.%nOpponent can\'t choose an action.%nGame cannot be finished.
There is no Nash equilibrium in this game.%nOpponent can\'t choose an action.%nGame cannot be finished.
The game could not be finished!
